Analytical quality assurance planÂ¶

This analytical quality assurance (AQA) plan outlines our implementation of the Aqua Book for this project. Further resources related to the Aqua Book are also available on GOV.UK.

This is a living document, and should be updated and/or modified as necessary. For example if new tasks not listed here become relevant to project success, please add them to this plan.
